thread.title: FUR BABY FRIDAY celebrates your ENC PETS
thread.title_full: FUR BABY FRIDAY celebrates your ENC PETS

author: @WITN
title: FUR BABY FRIDAY celebrates your ENC PETS
text: FUR BABY FRIDAY celebrates your ENC PETS Click here for all the details! GREENVILLE, N.C. (WITN) - ENC AT THREE has a weekly segment called “Fur Baby Friday” where WITN teams up with the [Humane Society of Eastern Carolina](https://www.hsecarolina.org/) in an effort to find a fur baby a new forever home. In celebration, we want to feature YOUR FUR BABIES from all across ENC in the show right before the “Fur Baby Friday” segment. THIS WEEK’S SEGMENT FEATURES: (a) MAISY from WITN’s Sutton Young (b) GINGER aka “G-MONSTER” from WITN’s Natalie Parsons View the FULL SEGMENT above to see all these fur babies on the small-screen! If you would like to have your pet featured, please be sure to [SUBMIT A PICTURE HERE](https://www.witn.com/community/user-content/) in the “Pet Pictures” category! Also, don’t forget to include the following information with your submission: -Your name -Where are you from? -Your pet’s name -Little blurb about your pet: Including things like how old and what type of pet? And anything else you’d like to include? And we look forward to seeing your submissions! :) Copyright 2023 WITN. All rights reserved.
